languages.text: "Слово о Неумирающем звучит на корабле... И за его пределами. Многие пираты, что живут разбоем, глухи к проповедям {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Экклезиархии{/g}. Но наше учение им понятнее. Оно тоже выковано в горнилах крови и насилия. И Кровавая паутина рассказывает им о вас. О вашей верности Ему". {n}Он склоняет голову.{/n} "Мы воздаем Домин должное".

"The word of the Undying One travels around the flagship... and beyond. Many pirates who live off plunder and murder are deaf to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s sermons. Our teaching is easier for them to understand. Much like the pirates themselves, it is forged in blood and violence. The Bloodspun Web has told them of you and your devotion to Him." {n}He bows his head.{/n} "We honour the Domin."
languages.original_text: "Слово о Неумирающем звучит на корабле... И за его пределами. Многие пираты, что живут разбоем, глухи к проповедям {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Экклезиархии{/g}. Но наше учение им понятнее. Оно тоже выковано в горнилах крови и насилия. И Кровавая паутина рассказывает им о вас. О вашей верности Ему". {n}Он склоняет голову.{/n} "Мы воздаем Домин должное".

Our teaching is easier for them to understand. Much like the pirates themselves, it is forged in blood and violence. The Bloodspun Web has told them of you and your devotion to Him." {n}He bows his head.{/n} "We honour the Domin."

languages.text: "Die Welt des Todlosen reist um das Flaggschiff ... und darüber hinaus. Viele Piraten, die von Plünderung und Mord leben, sind für die Predigten der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekklesiarchie{/g} taub. Unsere Lehre ist für sie leichter zu verstehen. Wie die Piraten selbst basiert sie auf Blut und Gewalt. Das Blutgesponnene Netz hat ihnen von Euch und Eurer Hingabe für Ihn erzählt." {n}Er neigt seinen Kopf.{/n} "Wir verehren den Domin."
languages.original_text: "The word of the Undying One travels around the flagship... and beyond. Many pirates who live off plunder and murder are deaf to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s sermons. Our teaching is easier for them to understand. Das Blutgesponnene Netz hat ihnen von Euch und Eurer Hingabe für Ihn erzählt." {n}Er neigt seinen Kopf.{/n} "Wir verehren den Domin."

languages.text: « La parole de l'Immortel s'est répandue sur le vaisseau amiral... et au-delà. De nombreux pirates qui vivent de pillages et de meurtre sont sourds aux sermons de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclésiarchie{/g}. Nos enseignements sont plus faciles à comprendre pour eux. Puisque comme eux, ils ont été forgés dans le sang et la violence. La Toile de Sang leur a parlé de vous et de votre dévotion à l'Empereur. » {n}Il incline la tête.{/n} « Nous honorons {mf|le|la} Domin. »
languages.original_text: "The word of the Undying One travels around the flagship... and beyond. Many pirates who live off plunder and murder are deaf to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s sermons. Our teaching is easier for them to understand. Much like the pirates themselves, it is forged in blood and violence. The Bloodspun Web has told them of you and your devotion to Him." {n}He bows his head.{/n} "We honour the Domin."

Nos enseignements sont plus faciles à comprendre pour eux. Puisque comme eux, ils ont été forgés dans le sang et la violence. La Toile de Sang leur a parlé de vous et de votre dévotion à l'Empereur. » {n}Il incline la tête.{/n} « Nous honorons {mf|le|la} Domin. »

« La parole de l'Immortel s'est répandue sur le vaisseau amiral... et au-delà. De nombreux pirates qui vivent de pillages et de meurtre sont sourds aux sermons de l'Ecclésiarchie. Nos enseignements sont plus faciles à comprendre pour eux. Puisque comme eux, ils ont été forgés dans le sang et la violence. La Toile de Sang leur a parlé de vous et de votre dévotion à l'Empereur. » {n}Il incline la tête.{/n} « Nous honorons {mf|le|la} Domin. »

languages.text: «La palabra del Inmortal circula por toda la nave insignia... y más allá. Muchos piratas que viven del saqueo y el asesinato son sordos a los sermones de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Eclesiarquía{/g}. Nuestras enseñanzas les son mucho más comprensibles. Al igual que los propios piratas, están forjadas en sangre y violencia. La Red Sanguinolenta les ha hablado de usted y su devoción hacia Él». {n}Inclina la cabeza.{/n} «Le honramos, Domin».
languages.original_text: "The word of the Undying One travels around the flagship... and beyond. Many pirates who live off plunder and murder are deaf to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s sermons. Our teaching is easier for them to understand. Much like the pirates themselves, it is forged in blood and violence. The Bloodspun Web has told them of you and your devotion to Him." {n}He bows his head.{/n} "We honour the Domin."

traits.locale_text: «La palabra del Inmortal circula por toda la nave insignia... y más allá. Muchos piratas que viven del saqueo y el asesinato son sordos a los sermones de la Eclesiarquía. Nuestras enseñanzas les son mucho más comprensibles. Al igual que los propios piratas, están forjadas en sangre y violencia. La Red Sanguinolenta les ha hablado de usted y su devoción hacia Él». {n}Inclina la cabeza.{/n} «Le honramos, Domin».

languages.text: 「不死の者の言葉は旗艦中を巡り…その外側へも伝わっていく。略奪と殺人を生業とする海賊の多くは、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}帝国聖教会{/g}の説教には耳を貸さない。我々の教えは彼らにも理解しやすい。海賊どもとあまり変わらない、血と暴力の中で鍛えられたものだ。ブラッドスパン・ウェブは彼らに、あなたとあなたの主への献身を伝えたのだ」{n}彼は頭を下げる。{/n}「我らはドミンを称えましょう」
languages.original_text: "The word of the Undying One travels around the flagship... and beyond. Many pirates who live off plunder and murder are deaf to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s sermons. Our teaching is easier for them to understand. Much like the pirates themselves, it is forged in blood and violence. The Bloodspun Web has told them of you and your devotion to Him." {n}He bows his head.{/n} "We honour the Domin."

traits.locale_text: 「不死の者の言葉は旗艦中を巡り…その外側へも伝わっていく。略奪と殺人を生業とする海賊の多くは、帝国聖教会の説教には耳を貸さない。我々の教えは彼らにも理解しやすい。海賊どもとあまり変わらない、血と暴力の中で鍛えられたものだ。ブラッドスパン・ウェブは彼らに、あなたとあなたの主への献身を伝えたのだ」{n}彼は頭を下げる。{/n}「我らはドミンを称えましょう」

languages.text: “不死之神的教义在旗舰上传播开来……甚至传播到了更远的地方。许多以掠夺、谋杀为生的海盗对{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}国教{/g}的说教充耳不闻，但对他们来说，我们的教条更容易理解。正如那些海盗一样，我们的教条也同样是通过鲜血与暴力锻造而成的，织血罗网让那些海盗看到了您与您对不死之神的虔诚。”{n}他低下头。{/n}“我们尊敬您，秘者。”
languages.original_text: "The word of the Undying One travels around the flagship... and beyond. Many pirates who live off plunder and murder are deaf to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s sermons. Our teaching is easier for them to understand. Much like the pirates themselves, it is forged in blood and violence. The Bloodspun Web has told them of you and your devotion to Him." {n}He bows his head.{/n} "We honour the Domin."

traits.locale_text: “不死之神的教义在旗舰上传播开来……甚至传播到了更远的地方。许多以掠夺、谋杀为生的海盗对国教的说教充耳不闻，但对他们来说，我们的教条更容易理解。正如那些海盗一样，我们的教条也同样是通过鲜血与暴力锻造而成的，织血罗网让那些海盗看到了您与您对不死之神的虔诚。”{n}他低下头。{/n}“我们尊敬您，秘者。”
“不死之神的教义在旗舰上传播开来……甚至传播到了更远的地方。许多以掠夺、谋杀为生的海盗对国教的说教充耳不闻，但对他们来说，我们的教条更容易理解。正如那些海盗一样，我们的教条也同样是通过鲜血与暴力锻造而成的，织血罗网让那些海盗看到了您与您对不死之神的虔诚。”{n}他低下头。{/n}“我们尊敬您，秘者。”

languages.text: "Ölmeyen'in namı gemide ve ötesinde büyüyor. Yağma ve katliam ile yaşayan korsanların çoğunun kulağı {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekleşiarşi'nin{/g} vaazlarına tıkalıdır. Bizim öğretilerimiz onlar için anlaması daha kolaydır, tıpkı korsanlar gibi kanla ve vahşetle yazılmıştır. Kanipi Ağı onlara sizden ve sizin O'na olan bağlılığınızdan söz etti." {n}Başını eğiyor.{/n} "Domin'in hizmetindeyiz."
languages.original_text: "The word of the Undying One travels around the flagship... and beyond. Many pirates who live off plunder and murder are deaf to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}'s sermons. Our teaching is easier for them to understand. Much like the pirates themselves, it is forged in blood and violence. The Bloodspun Web has told them of you and your devotion to Him." {n}He bows his head.{/n} "We honour the Domin."
